sections.heading: Continuation of usufruct after sale of propertyIf property subject to the usufruct is sold to pay an estate debt, or a debt of the grantor, the usufruct attaches to any proceeds of the sale of the property that remain after payment of the debt
sections.text: Acts 1976, No. 103, ยง1; Acts 2010, No. 881, ยง1, eff. Jul
